brief: This class can be used for configuring the Processing Sound library.

methods.name: list()
methods.desc: Shows information about available audio devices

methods.name: sampleRate()
methods.desc: Get or set the internal sample rate of the synthesis engine.

methods.name: inputDevice()
methods.desc: Choose the device (sound card) which should be used for grabbing audio input using AudioIn.

methods.name: outputDevice()
methods.desc: Choose the device (sound card) which the Sound library's audio output should be sent to.

methods.name: volume()
methods.desc: Set the overall output volume of the Processing sound library.

methods.name: status()
methods.desc:
Prints information about the sound library's current memory and 
 CPU usage

description: This class can be used for configuring the Processing Sound library. The Sound class allows for configuring global properties of the sound library's audio synthesis and playback, such as the output device, sample rate or global output volume. Information on available input and output devices can be obtained by calling Sound.list()
name: Sound

parameters.name: sampleRate
parameters.description: the sample rate to be used by the synthesis engine (default 44100)

parameters.name: outputDevice
parameters.description: the device id of the sound card that sound should be played on

parameters.name: inputDevice
parameters.description:
the device id of the sound card from which sound should be
            captured

parameters.name: volume
parameters.description: the overall output volume of the library (default 1.0)
